## GlyphIdList.Remove method

Removes glyph id from the list.

```csharp
public bool Remove(GlyphId glyphId)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| glyphId | GlyphId | glyph identifier |

### Return Value

true if item is successfully removed; otherwise, false
